dt-button.name: savedStatesCreate
dt-button.summary: Extends `-button savedStates`, adding creating functionality to the collection normally displayed
dt-button.description:
This button extends the `-button savedStates` button to include the `-button createState` button in the collection that is normally displayed when the `-button savedStates` button is pressed.
As well as the `-button createState` button, the usual collection that contains a number of `-button stateRestore` buttons, one for each state that is being stored by `-init stateRestore`, is shown.
dt-button.option: This option allows for StateRestore to be configured. All of the `stateRestore.*` options can be configured within this object.
